wikipedia_page.main: John Capaldi (born 16 November 1959) is a Scottish former footballer who played for Aston Villa, Motherwell and Pors Grenland, and also had a spell managing Bolehall Swifts. During his career, he played as a striker.

response: Capaldi was born in Porsgrunn, Norway, while his Scottish father, John Capaldi, was playing for the local team Pors Grenland.
